squidpony.panel

Class IColoredString.Impl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.panel.IColoredString.Impl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of colors
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<IColoredString.Bucket<T>>, IColoredString<T>
    Enclosing interface:
    IColoredString<T>

    public static class IColoredString.Impl<T>
extends Object
implements IColoredString<T>
    A basic implementation of IColoredString.
    Author:
    smelC

      • wrap

        public List<IColoredString<T>> wrap(int width)
        Specified by:
        wrap in interface IColoredString<T>
        Parameters:
        width - A positive integer
        Returns:
        this split in pieces that would fit in a display with width columns (if all words in this are smaller or equal in length to width, otherwise wrapping will fail for these words).

      • justify

        public IColoredString<T> justify(int width)
        Description copied from interface: IColoredString
        This method does NOT guarantee that the result's length is width. It is impossible to do correct justifying if this's length is greater than width or if this has no space character.
        Specified by:
        justify in interface IColoredString<T>
        Returns:
        A variant of this where spaces have been introduced in-between words, so that this's length is as close as possible to width. Or this itself if unaffected.
